node.title: Pilot to appear in court charged with murder of missing Victorian campers
node.alt: A composite image of a man and woman, both in their 70s
node.description: A 55-year-old Melbourne pilot will appear in the Sale Magistrates Court this morning charged with the murder of Russell Hill and Carol Clay, who went missingÂ in March 2020.
node.content:
["A Melbourne pilot will appear in a Gippsland court today charged with the murder of two campers who disappeared in Victoria's High Country\u00a0last year.", "Caroline Springs man Greg Lynn, 55, was arrested on Monday afternoon by special operations officers at a campsite near Moroka Road at Arbuckle Junction, 55 kilometres from where campers Russell Hill and Carol Clay, both in their 70s,\u00a0were last seen in the remote Wonnangatta Valley.", "Officers also seized Mr Lynn's\u00a0Nissan Patrol for forensic testing.", "Mr Lynn is due to appear in the Sale Magistrates Court today.", "Victoria Police Crime Command Assistant Commissioner Bob Hill last night said the investigation was ongoing and that police were still searching for Mr Hill and Ms Clay's remains.", "\"Police are hopeful that we will be able to locate the deceased and provide ultimate closure to the families,\" he said.", "\"My heartfelt thoughts are with both the Hill and Clay families.\"", "", "
Both the site of the arrest and the camp site the pair disappeared from are in a remote part of Gippsland.\u00a0(ABC News)
", "Police are also still appealing for information about the whereabouts of a blue trailer that was attached to the Nissan Patrol.", "The assistant commissioner said it was believed the trailer was sold on online marketplace Gumtree.", "Mr Hill and Ms Clay were last heard from on March 20 last year.", "Their campsite was found burnt out, but Mr Hill's four-wheel drive was still there.", "Mr Lynn was a pilot for Jetstar Airways. The airline confirmed he had been suspended after his arrest.", "Anyone with\u00a0information should contact CrimeStoppers on 1800 333 000.\u00a0"]
